readingKunHtml: おご, にご, よな
sourceMeaningMnemonic: If the <radical>tsunami</radical> that's heading for your village is <radical>fat</radical> you should try to <kanji>select</kanji> a different one to hit instead. You don't want to select fat tsunamis because they do more damage.
meaningInfo: Imagine being at the tsunami store and selecting the least fat one there.
readingMnemonic: If you're having trouble <kanji>select</kanji>ing which one is the least fat just check to see which tsunamis are eating <reading>ta</reading>cos (<ja>た</ja>). Only fat tsunamis will be eating them, so just look for one without a taco.
readingInfo: While you select the tsunami that's right for you. Keep an eye out for those fat taco-eating ones. And then stay away from them!
